title: Typophile Map
content:
Hello,   
I left my sign of the "Where are you? Mark your location on the Typophile Map!" at the right of the board. I think someone should put a notice before clicking, such as "Warning! To use this map you'll be prompted for your email address. This is not a Typophile service, therefore your address will be held by who-knows from now on. You may guess what the use."
author: manard
